Package com.soebes.itf.extension.assertj

Class MavenITAssertions

java.lang.Object
org.assertj.core.api.Assertions
com.soebes.itf.extension.assertj.MavenITAssertions
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.assertj.core.api.InstanceOfAssertFactories
@API(status=EXPERIMENTAL, since="0.1.0") public class MavenITAssertions extends org.assertj.core.api.Assertions
Entry point to all Maven specific assertions needed in integration testing.
Author:
Karl Heinz Marbaise
